snippet: The Defense Department has referred charges including terrorism, hijacking, murder and war crimes against Khalid Sheikh Mohammed and four others accused of planning the Sept. 11, 2001, attacks to a commission for trial by a military judge at...
abstract: Defense Department refers charges against Khalid Sheikh Mohammed and four others accused of planning Sept 11 terrorist attacks to a commission for trial by a military judge at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.
lead_paragraph: The Defense Department has referred charges including terrorism, hijacking, murder and war crimes against Khalid Sheikh Mohammed and four others accused of planning the Sept. 11, 2001, attacks to a commission for trial by a military judge at Guantánamo Bay, Cuba.

headline.main: Sept. 11 Suspects to Be Tried by Military
headline.print_headline: Sept. 11 Suspects To Be Tried By Military

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
